\subsection{Comma Category}
For categories $A, B, C$ and functors $F:A\to C, G:B\to C$, the comma
category $(F\downarrow G)$ consists of:
\parencite{adamek_herrlich_strecker:joy_cats}
\begin{itemize}
  \item Objects:\\
    $(a, f, b) \in (F\downarrow G),
      \ (\forall a\in A, b\in B, f: F a \to G b)$
  \item Morphisms:\\
    $(g, h) : (a, f, b) \to (a', f', b'),
      \ (\forall g: a \to a',\ h: b\to b')$\\
    Such that the following diagram commutes:
    % https://q.uiver.app/?q=WzAsNCxbMCwwLCJGIGEiXSxbMSwwLCJGIGEnIl0sWzAsMSwiR2IiXSxbMSwxLCJHIGInIl0sWzAsMSwiRmciXSxbMiwzLCJHaCIsMl0sWzAsMiwiZiIsMl0sWzEsMywiZiciXV0=
    \[\begin{tikzcd}
        {F a} & {F a'} \\
        Gb & {G b'}
        \arrow["Fg", from=1-1, to=1-2]
        \arrow["Gh"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
        \arrow["f"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
        \arrow["{f'}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
      \end{tikzcd}\]
\end{itemize}

e.g.
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\begin{equation*}
  \begin{tikzcd}
    A & {0_A} & {1_A} \\
    & {F(0_A)} & {F(1_A)} \\
    C \\
    & {G(0_B)} & {G(1_B)} \\
    B & {0_B} & {1_B}
    \arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{f_A}", from=1-2, to=1-3]
    \arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{f_B}"', from=5-2, to=5-3]
    \arrow[""{name=2, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{F(f_A)}", from=2-2, to=2-3]
    \arrow["\alpha"', from=2-2, to=4-2]
    \arrow["\beta", from=2-3, to=4-3]
    \arrow[""{name=3, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{G(f_B)}"', from=4-2, to=4-3]
    \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, dotted, from=1-2, to=2-2]
    \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, dotted, from=1-3, to=2-3]
    \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dotted, from=5-2, to=4-2]
    \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dotted, from=5-3, to=4-3]
    \arrow["F"{description}, draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, from=1-1, to=3-1]
    \arrow["G"{description}, draw={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, from=5-1, to=3-1]
    \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, shorten <=2pt, shorten >=6pt, dotted, from=0, to=2]
    \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, shorten <=2pt, shorten >=6pt, dotted, from=1, to=3]
  \end{tikzcd}
  ,\quad (F\downarrow G)\ \ =
  % https://q.uiver.app/?q=WzAsMixbMCwwLCJcXGJlZ2lue3BtYXRyaXh9MF9BXFxcXFxcYWxwaGFcXFxcMF9CXFxlbmR7cG1hdHJpeH0iXSxbMSwwLCJcXGJlZ2lue3BtYXRyaXh9MV9BXFxcXFxcYmV0YVxcXFwxX0JcXGVuZHtwbWF0cml4fSJdLFswLDEsIihmX0EsZl9CKSJdXQ==
  \begin{tikzcd}
    {\begin{pmatrix}0_A\\\alpha\\0_B\end{pmatrix}} & {\begin{pmatrix}1_A\\\beta\\1_B\end{pmatrix}}
    \arrow["{(f_A,f_B)}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
  \end{tikzcd}
\end{equation*}
